sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto had a rough November. The pain is persisting into December — and that could signal trouble ahead for the stock market.
Crypto Alert: Bitcoin Slides Toward $84K, Traders Hunting Apeing as Next 100x Crypto While ETH and Tron Hold Strong
AI-powered sentiment signals give everyday traders the same edge institutions use. Delivered as clear, data-driven signals.
Crypto markets were already on edge heading into President Donald Trump's 9 PM EST primetime address to the nation from the White House.
More traders are turning to bots as the always-on crypto market demands faster execution than humans can deliver.

hypothesis_content.title: Post-News Sentiment Exhaustion Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: When 3+ major crypto news headlines (CoinDesk, Cointelegraph, The Block) cluster within 2 hours during NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes, and the initial 30-minute price reaction exceeds ±2.5%, fading that initial move yields positive expectancy over the next 6-12 hours as news-driven liquidity is absorbed.
hypothesis_content.rationale: News clustering creates emotional, liquidity-driven moves that often overextend in non-trending markets. The fade capitalizes on exhaustion of immediate reaction and reversion to pre-news technical levels as algorithmic traders absorb the liquidity spike.
entry_conditions: ≥3 major crypto news headlines within 120 minutes
Absolute BTC 30-minute return following first headline > 2.5%
Enter in opposite direction of initial move at 30-minute candle close

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial 30-minute move
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price extends another 1.5% in direction of initial move

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 40% of fade trades reach 50% retracement before hitting stop loss, indicating news momentum persists beyond initial reaction period.
